alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 10:18PM PST until February 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON PST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is possible down to 3,000 feet with up to 3 inches of snow possible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
